DataElement.preferredName: First-Line Therapy Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response indicating whether or not the patient has been administered first-line therapy that meets the eligibility requirements as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: First-Line Therapy Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition.

Concepts.definition: The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: URCC22063
ReferenceDocuments.description: Plan to start first line systemic anti-cancer therapy (chemotherapy, immunotherapy, targeted therapy, interventional clinical trial) in the next 6 weeks or has started first-line systemic therapy in the previous 6 weeks.

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 1/10/23 Released for CCTG cjl; 9/19/23 Created CDE for URMC for ticket number CADSR0002862. Added AQT and CSI cjl.
